relevant_findings.HEENT: PERRL, sclera anicteric, moist mucous membranes, no cervical lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.CV: Normal S1 & S2, regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, crackles, or rubs
relevant_findings.abdominal: Distended/obese, bowel sounds present, mildly tender to palpation over epigastrum, no rebound or guarding, no peritoneal signs
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused, bilateral knee tenderness on flexion/extension, left toe painful upon palpation, no warmth, erythema, or swelling of joints, 2+ dorsalis pedis pulses
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, awake, oriented x 3, cranial nerves II-XII intact
